revised_title: Search for Nuclear Disintegrations Produced by Slow Negative Heavy Mesons
tldr: This paper describes a search for nuclear interactions of negative heavy mesons using photographic emulsions. The authors analyzed 417 tracks of cr-mesons and found no disintegrations that can be attributed to heavy mesons. The results suggest that some negative heavy mesons may behave differently from negative mu particles when brought to rest in photographic emulsions. Possible explanations for this result are discussed.
